General.Name: Momentum MultiAsset Value Trust PLC
General.Description: Seneca Global Income & Growth Trust plc is a closed-ended multi-asset fund of funds launched and managed by Seneca Investment Managers Limited. The fund invests in the public equity and fixed income markets of United Kingdom. It focuses on investments across diversified sectors. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the 3 month LIBOR. It was previously known as Midas Income & Growth Trust plc. Seneca Global Income & Growth Trust plc was formed on August 19, 2005 and is domiciled in United Kingdom.
General.Address: 12 The Parks, Saint Helens, United Kingdom, WA12 0JQ
